name: SEUM: The Drunk Side of the Moon
name_original: SEUM: The Drunk Side of the Moon
description:
SEUM: The Drunk Side of the Moon is an indie, action, shooter and adventure game developed by Pine Studio. It was originally released in 2017. Headup Games published the game.
You can play SEUM: The Drunk Side of the Moon on PC, Xbox One, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via Steam and GOG.
